name: Super Mario Glitchy 4 SMG3's Revenge
description:
A long time ago in the Mushroom Kingdom not Far enough away. SMG3 has hacked all of SMG4's servers and stole all of his money. Join SMG4 and his friends to save the day, and defeat the evil SMG3. His memes depend on you. Can you save the day?

Note: this is not a regular Super Mario Bros Game. It's been hacked by SMG3 and with new levels and upbeat music. Falling off a ledge won't make you come back, you may need to restart the game from the beginning again. The whole game is like Cat Mario, and a lot of laughs familiar characters along the way.

SMG4/ Hobo Bros. Please make If Mario was in Helluva Boss.

The controls are arrow keys to move and Shoot fire at enemies like normal Super Mario Bros Game.
